data.title: Even better than before
data.text:
I went through this store 2 or 3 times on prior visits. Always liked what I saw but I was too cheap to pull the trigger on anything.  Then I bought a James Harris buckle and belt. A few years later I added a Randall Moore and another Harris.

Great website but even better service

data.title: Easy website, great selection and the fastest shipping in the West!
data.text:
I originally bought a belt and buckle set in Santa Fe 20 years ago and the belt finally bit the dust after twenty years of daily wear.
Needing a replacement belt I searched on-line until I found Tom Taylor, and I couldn't be happier with the purchase. I needed a rather hard-to-find tapered belt and they had a terrific selection.
The bonus was complementary shipping, the same day as I placed the order! 
All I can say is that it doesn't get any better than that.

data.title: Western belts and buckles with great style
data.text: Tom Taylor offers a wide variety of Western design leather belts and buckles. There are lizard, alligator, woven leather and tooled leather, to mention a few. The quality is very good and the prices are reasonable. The staff is helpful.

data.title: Wonderful selection and great service
data.text: I have walked into this store almost every time I come to Santa Fe and finally decided to move up from those cheap factory belts to a first quality belt. The experience was great --- no pressure and I took something home I am very happy with.

data.title: Cool men and women's belts, buckles,etc
data.text: Expensive but cool. Like all of Santa Fe, rather expensive. Lots of one of a kind items here. My favorite turquoise buckle came from here.

data.title: Beautiful beaded belts and Solid Silver buckles
data.text: Years ago l owned a hand beaded belt with a silver buckle and I somehow managed to lose it. I searched for a replacement for years with no luck.  Last year I happened upon Tom Taylor's and found a wonderful selection of hand beaded belts along with exquisitely crafted sterling silver belt buckles.  I highly recommend the craftsmanship, value and beauty of all the items at Tom Taylor!
